description:
medium toned wood with vertical grain; brass butt; PL side of stock: wood ornately carved; silver, four-pointed star; PR side of stock: brass patch box with silver highlights; four-pointed flower in brass; trigger housing brass with silver and copper highlights; inlaid silver filigree down length of barrel; engraved in top: "Made for Margie and Gordon Barlow by W. Gusler 2003". 
Arms and Armor-Firearm
medium: Curly maple, iron, steel, brass, silver, copper
title: Virginia-style (c. 1785) "New School" Flintlock Longrifle
